entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is sending a letter to Sirius.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, who is tasked with delivering the letter.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend, whose family has tickets to the Quidditch World Cup.

entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: A major event in the wizarding world, where Harry and Ron will be attending.

relationships.description: Harry assigns Hedwig the task of delivering a letter to Sirius.
Harry is writing a letter to Sirius, which will be delivered by Hedwig.
Hedwig is tasked with delivering the letter from Harry to Sirius.
Ron and his family have tickets to attend the Quidditch World Cup.
